name: PlatformerCharacterAnimator
shortDescription: Change animations and horizontal flipping of platformer characters automatically.
description: Automatically change the animations and horizontal flipping of platformer characters based on movement and interaction with platform objects.
The platformer example uses this extension ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://platformer)).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Change animations and horizontal flipping of platformer characters automatically.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: PlatformerCharacterAnimator

events.name: Flip character based on input from controls
Flip character based on input from controls

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) automated animation changes a platformer character. Disabling animation changes is useful to play custom animations.
eventsFunctions.name: EnableChangingAnimations

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) automated horizontal flipping of a platform character.
eventsFunctions.name: EnableHorizontalFlipping

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Change animations and horizontal flipping of platformer characters automatically.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: PlatformerCharacterAnimator3D

events.name: Flip character based on input from controls

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the platformer character is looking left.
eventsFunctions.name: IsLookingLeft

eventsFunctions.description: Check if animation should be changed according to the platformer character movement.
eventsFunctions.name: EnableAnimationChanges

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) animation changes according to the platformer character movement. Disabling animation changes is useful to play custom animations.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnableAnimationChanges

eventsFunctions.description: Check if automated horizontal flipping of a platform character is enabled.
eventsFunctions.name: EnableHorizontalFlipping

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) automated horizontal flipping of a platform character.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnableHorizontalFlipping

eventsFunctions.description: the flipping rotation duration of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: RotationDuration

eventsFunctions.description: the "Idle" animation name of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: IdleAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: the "Run" animation name of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: RunAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: the "Jump" animation name of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: JumpAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: the "Fall" animation name of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FallAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: the "Climb" animation name of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: ClimbAnimationName
